seal of approval.translation[0].definiti: if you give something your seal of approval, you say that you approve of it, especially officially
A number of employers have already given their seal of approval to the scheme.
seal of approval.translation[1].definiti: a mark or sign that shows that an organization has tested a product and it meets their standards
Environmentally friendly products are marked with a special seal of approval.
if you give something your seal of approval, you say officially or publicly that you approve of it
All we need now is the chairmanâ€™s seal of approval.
